casebody.data:
MICHIGAN OPEN CARRY, INC. and Kenneth Herman, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
CLIO AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT, Fletcher Spears, III, and Katrina Mitchell, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 155204
COA: 329418 Supreme Court of Michigan. December 14, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for rehearing is considered, and it is DENIED.
